metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4479 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
lib/sup/message_chunks.rb in Sup before 0.13.2.1 and 0.14.x before 0.14.1.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the content_type of an email attachment.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4479` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

sup-mail - 0.22.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sup-mail package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.22.1-1').
